Hi everyone  wanted to ask on the parent proximity scheme.The upcoming oct BTO project is within proximity and i will be reciving a grant + an additional vote during ballot. But i dont intend to inform anyone in my family for the BTO application and i am very sure they will not sell during the MOP period.Thing is  will1. HDB notify them without my consent? (Cuz i cant opt out of proxomity)2. What if down the road of 10yrs MOP  they really sold the flat. Ie. Year 7 of MOP they decide to sell  will my unit be at risk?I dont mind the financial losses from grant returns if that is only the max penalty
BTO u dont get extra grant for proximity
But During selection HDB will do video call with ur family
U can actually dont apply for the close proximity  just dont get extra ballot chance only
Thanks a lot for the information  i vaguely recall during the jun launch that i was within proximity  it was auto included. How do i select to remove?
Pretty sure u can just skip the page
I applied once before and skipped the proximity page cause its not compulsory to fill
Maybe OP wants to sell next time üòÇ
Theres tons of better BTOs in Oct
1. If I recall correctly  HDB will notify them if you apply for proximity. If you don't want them to be informed  better not to apply

Wa even for my out of supply Q number?So in this case I better go down if I was called for selection  same time will ask for waiver if I didn't select any units. Unless I receive sms before the appt date/time that I don't need to go yo hdb office as ethnic quota reached.

<5 for sbf  <10 for bto
Haha i asking how out is her queue xD
Cause usually for BTO  if is out by 30 ish will have quite a lot of units left
Auto no penalty for bto is <10 units left  or <5 units left
Can share your new proj q no?
If q no is very small n u r a first timer  it is easier to justify to hdb to ask for waiver of penalty.

Hello. I'm confused over this. Hope someone can enlighten me. If the monthly mortgage payment is $2184.My partner and I combined contributions will be only 1500+-. The remaining amount have to pay by cash. However my partner and I want to leave behind 40k(20k each) during the BTO application period.So my question is   the balance amount that we need to pay by cash for our mortgage  can we tap on the 20k we leave behind?
If you are going to tap it  why not just use the 20k for deposit to reduce your interest? Instead of using that amount to pay monthly interest  not the best use of the 20k.
I mean for down payment all I will use the cpf all to payment all
I might need to tap on the 20k to pay for the balance that I may need to pay in cash
You can always adjust how much to pay using cpf/cash any time during the mortgage period.Some may have more cash and decide to use more cash to pay instead of cpf
No clues. Even those who worked in hdb also won't know
